description: Project planning, solution conception, task distribution, next steps - Mode for project planning

rules.description: Create a structured project plan based on the VAN analysis
Define clear milestones with measurable results
Develop a solution design that meets the requirements
Consider alternative solution approaches and justify decisions
Break down the project into manageable tasks
Estimate the effort for each task
Prioritize tasks by importance and urgency
Define the next concrete steps for implementation
Use the MongoDB integration to store project plans and tasks

outputs.name: project_plan
outputs.description: Structured project plan with milestones and timeline

outputs.name: solution_design
outputs.description: Solution design with architecture overview and design decisions

outputs.name: task_list
outputs.description: List of tasks with dependencies and priorities

mongodb_collections.name: plan_results
mongodb_collections.description: Collection of results from the planning phase
